title: The Real Genius of AI Investing: Why Venture Capital Isn’t a 1980s Frito-Lay Sweepstakes

quotes.quote: The real genius (the Real Genius) is knowing when not to invest, knowing why to invest, and knowing that even infinite capital can’t guarantee you infinite outcomes.
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

quotes.quote: Owning 1% of every AI company isn’t a strategy; it’s a very expensive form of FOMO
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

author: David Thyresson
